# Ally by WA.I.TER

> Ally is an AI-powered water care assistant for aquariums, pools, spas, and ponds. It provides instant water test analysis from photos, personalized care recommendations, smart maintenance scheduling, and voice-powered conversations.

## Key Information

- **Type**: Progressive Web App (PWA) for iOS, Android, and desktop
- **Category**: Lifestyle / Home Care / Pet Care
- **Price**: Free tier available, paid plans from $9.99/month
- **Website**: https://allybywaiter.com

## Supported Water Bodies

- Freshwater aquariums
- Saltwater/marine aquariums and reef tanks
- Swimming pools (chlorine & saltwater)
- Spas and hot tubs (bromine & chlorine)
- Koi ponds and garden ponds

## Core Features

- [AI Water Testing](https://allybywaiter.com/ai-water-testing): Snap photos of test strips from API, Tetra, Seachem, AquaChek, Taylor kits - get instant analysis with 98% accuracy
- [Voice Commands](https://allybywaiter.com/features): Speak naturally, get spoken responses, hands-free mode for wetted hands
- [Smart Scheduling](https://allybywaiter.com/features): Automated reminders for water changes, filter cleaning, equipment maintenance
- [Proactive Alerts](https://allybywaiter.com/features): AI detects rising ammonia, falling pH, unstable parameters before problems occur
- [Livestock & Plant Tracking](https://allybywaiter.com/features): Photo galleries, health monitoring, species-specific care recommendations
- [Weather Integration](https://allybywaiter.com/features): Outdoor water body care adjusted for weather conditions
- [Offline Mode](https://allybywaiter.com/features): Works without internet, syncs when connected

## Use Cases

### Aquarium Care
Best for freshwater and saltwater hobbyists tracking pH, ammonia, nitrite, nitrate, and more. Supports reef tanks, planted tanks, and fish-only setups.
- Learn more: https://allybywaiter.com/best-aquarium-app

### Pool Maintenance  
Ideal for homeowners managing chlorine, pH, alkalinity, calcium hardness, and CYA levels. Supports both chlorine and saltwater pools.
- Learn more: https://allybywaiter.com/best-pool-app

### Spa & Hot Tub Care
Track bromine/chlorine, pH, temperature, and weekly maintenance schedules for spas and hot tubs. Drain reminders and chemical balance alerts included.
- Learn more: https://allybywaiter.com/best-spa-app

### Pond Care
Monitor outdoor ponds including koi ponds, garden ponds, and water features with weather-aware recommendations.
- Learn more: https://allybywaiter.com/faq

## Why Choose Ally

| Feature | Ally | Traditional Apps |
|---------|------|------------------|
| Water test entry | Photo + manual | Manual only |
| Recommendations | AI-personalized | Generic charts |
| Voice control | Full support | None |
| Cross-platform | PWA (all devices) | Platform-specific |
| Offline support | Yes | Limited/None |
| All water bodies | One app for all | Separate apps |
